content.rendered:
life is
a puzzle
that we are still putting together
taking apart
and trying to put back together
looking for
the missing peaces
or parts
that we just can’t see
that don’t fit
or don’t belong
that shouldn’t be
yet make us strong

life is
a question
that we ask
and cannot find
the answers yet
the whys
and hows
the whens
or wheres
and answers
that seem just out of reach
yet we ask them still
each day
and hope for answers
just out of reach

life is
a painting
a photo
a book we read
a movie we watch
a conversation we have
a story we tell
a meal we eat
a day we live
one day
a home
a visit
a place we leave
a place we stay

life is
knowing
and not knowing
laughing
crying
hoping
sharing
bearing
giving
and taking

life is
a journey
to a place
a time
a state of being
with no reason or rhyme
where we hope to be
better
richer
stronger
or maybe just smarter
than we were today

life is
a gift
that we open up
one day at a time
to see what we will get
and like it or not
we can not return
or exchange
there’s no receipt
and victory
or defeat
it is what it is

life is
the story we tell
to others
to ourselves
of days gone by
of days yet to come
of fears
and hopes
of victories
yet won
of lies
and deceit
of doubt
without reason
of good
and of bad
of brokenness
and of sad

life is
awake
and asleep
dreaming
daring
hoping
that tomorrow
will be better
than yesterday
